text: Fabian Bredlow (born 2 March 1995) is a football player from Germany. He plays for F. C. Liefering, the second team of F.C. Red Bull Salzburg, in the SKY GO Erste Liga (2nd level in Austrian football) as goalkeeper. ==Career== He started playing football for FC Hertha 03 Zehlendorf . In 2012 he went on to RasenBallsport Leipzig U17. 2014 he went on loan to FC Liefering, where he is playing as goalkeeper in the SKY GO 1. Liga, which is the 2nd level in Austrian football On 11 October 2014, he played for the first time in the German U20 national team versus Turkey. Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Berlin Category:FC Red Bull Salzburg players
title: Fabian Bredlow
